# Low level functions for metabolomics data

[![Project Status: Active â€“ The project has reached a stable, usable
state and is being actively
developed.](https://www.repostatus.org/badges/latest/active.svg)](https://www.repostatus.org/#active)
[![R-CMD-check-bioc](https://github.com/RforMassSpectrometry/MetaboCoreUtils/workflows/R-CMD-check-bioc/badge.svg)](https://github.com/RforMassSpectrometry/MetaboCoreUtils/actions?query=workflow%3AR-CMD-check-bioc)
[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/rformassspectrometry/MetaboCoreUtils/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=bNwqkn4PKd)](https://codecov.io/gh/rformassspectrometry/MetaboCoreUtils)
[![license](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-Artistic--2.0-brightgreen.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/Artistic-2.0)
[![years in
bioc](http://bioconductor.org/shields/years-in-bioc/MetaboCoreUtils.svg)](https://bioconductor.org/packages/release/bioc/html/MetaboCoreUtils.html)
[![Ranking by
downloads](http://bioconductor.org/shields/downloads/release/MetaboCoreUtils.svg)](https://bioconductor.org/packages/stats/bioc/MetaboCoreUtils/)
[![build
release](http://bioconductor.org/shields/build/release/bioc/MetaboCoreUtils.svg)](https://bioconductor.org/checkResults/release/bioc-LATEST/MetaboCoreUtils/)
[![build
devel](http://bioconductor.org/shields/build/devel/bioc/MetaboCoreUtils.svg)](https://bioconductor.org/checkResults/devel/bioc-LATEST/MetaboCoreUtils/)

`MetaboCoreUtils` defines metabolomics-related core functionality which
is provided as low-level functions to allow a data structure-independent
usage across various R packages.

For more information see the package
[homepage](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils).

# Installation

The package can be installed with

``` r

install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("MetaboCoreUtils")
```

# Contributions

Contributions are highly welcome and should follow the [contribution
guidelines](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/RforMassSpectrometry/articles/RforMassSpectrometry.html#contributions).
Also, please check the coding style guidelines in the
[RforMassSpectrometry
vignette](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/RforMassSpectrometry/articles/RforMassSpectrometry.html).

# Package index

## All functions

- [`addElements()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/addElements.md)
  : Combine chemical formulae
- [`adductFormula()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/adductFormula.md)
  : Calculate a table of adduct (ionic) formulas
- [`adductNames()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/adductNames.md)
  [`adducts()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/adductNames.md)
  : Retrieve names of supported adducts
- [`calculateKm()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/calculateKendrickMass.md)
  [`calculateKmd()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/calculateKendrickMass.md)
  [`calculateRkmd()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/calculateKendrickMass.md)
  [`isRkmd()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/calculateKendrickMass.md)
  : Kendrick mass defects
- [`calculateMass()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/calculateMass.md)
  : Calculate exact mass
- [`containsElements()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/containsElements.md)
  : Check if one formula is contained in another
- [`convertMtime()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/convertMtime.md)
  : Convert migration times to effective mobility
- [`correctRindex()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/correctRindex.md)
  : 2-point correction of RIs
- [`countElements()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/countElements.md)
  : Count elements in a chemical formula
- [`fit_lm()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/fit_lm.md)
  [`adjust_lm()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/fit_lm.md)
  : Linear model-based normalization of abundance matrices
- [`formula2mz()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/formula2mz.md)
  : Calculate mass-to-charge ratio from a formula
- [`indexRtime()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/indexRtime.md)
  : Convert retention times to retention indices
- [`internalStandardMixNames()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/internalStandardMixNames.md)
  : Get names of internal standard mixes provided by the package
- [`internalStandards()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/internalStandards.md)
  : Get definitions for internal standards
- [`isotopicSubstitutionMatrix()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/isotopicSubstitutionMatrix.md)
  : Definitions of isotopic substitutions
- [`isotopologues()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/isotopologues.md)
  : Identfying isotopologue peaks in MS data
- [`mass2mz()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/mass2mz.md)
  : Calculate mass-to-charge ratio
- [`mclosest()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/mclosest.md)
  : Extract closest values in a pairwise manner between two matrices
- [`multiplyElements()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/multiplyElements.md)
  : Multiply chemical formulas by a scalar
- [`mz2mass()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/mz2mass.md)
  : Calculate neutral mass
- [`pasteElements()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/pasteElements.md)
  : Create chemical formula from a named vector
- [`rsd()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/quality_assessment.md)
  [`rowRsd()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/quality_assessment.md)
  [`rowDratio()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/quality_assessment.md)
  [`percentMissing()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/quality_assessment.md)
  [`rowPercentMissing()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/quality_assessment.md)
  [`rowBlank()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/quality_assessment.md)
  : Basic quality assessment functions for metabolomics
- [`standardizeFormula()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/standardizeFormula.md)
  : Standardize a chemical formula
- [`subtractElements()`](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/reference/subtractElements.md)
  : subtract two chemical formula

  Data](https://rformassspectrometry.github.io/MetaboCoreUtils/articles/MetaboCoreUtils.md):
